cx-javascript: Tuundina ka tuni "JavaScript" san ka bɔna, la kan ta'am tum, bii "browser" kuna ka suŋeri.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] de la tuunɛ ti tu kãbelɛ lerege pɛgera kɛ fum yetɔgum puan. [$1 Try it now!]
cx-error-server-connection: Tuure: kan ta'am tɔkɛ bo "server" la.
cx-desc: basɛ ti la kɔ'ɔm dɛna naana ti la [[Special:ContentTranslation|translate]] "content" pɛgera
cx-publish-page-success: Basɛ ti pɛgerɛ niɛ peelemi $1 puan
cx-publish-error-abuse-filter: Ba baŋɛ la "automatic filter" demesego daaŋɔ la n tari la daaŋɔ fu lerege la puan. "Filter" ŋmɛ: $1
cx-publish-error-empty: "Server" lebese mɛ gee ka le tara "data".
cx-publish-error-readonly: Ba ka sakɛ gulesegɔ n boi wiki puan.
cx-publish-error-spam-blacklist: Ba nyɛ sɛla ti ba wan ta'am iŋɛ n boi fu leregere la puan. Garrsegɔ: $1
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Tile la ti fu ŋmɛ la ba zagesɛ mɛ. N beleni fu mɛ looge yu'urɛ ayima bo fu leregere la.
cx-publish-error-unknown: Tuure mina ti ba ka le nyɛta n iŋɛ. Tuure garesegɔ: $1
cx-lost-session: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya
cx-lost-session-draft: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu demesego duma la kan ta'am biŋe see fum n ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-publish: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu kan ta'am niigɛ fu leregere la peelemi see fum n mɔregɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-dashboard: Suŋa ti tu iŋɛ itegɔ wa, n beleni fu mɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa.
cx-publish-summary: maalɛ mɛ gee lerege pɛgera la "$1"
cx-translation-target-page-exists: Pɛgerɛ n tari pɔsega [$1 $2] ni kɔ'ɔm bɔna la puti'irɛ "wiki" la puan.Dikɛ bisɛ ti fu bo pɛgerɛ la pɔsega yima yima.
tag-contenttranslation-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima tari ni puti'irɛ leregere lɔgerɔ tuna.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima puan na tari ni vuurɛ buyi n boi puti'irɛ la leregere lɔkɔ.
cx-beta-desc: Lɔkɔ n wan ta'am lerege pɛgera kalam kiŋɛ fu yetɔgum puan. Pɔsɛ leregera ze'ele [[Special:MyContributions|your contributions page]], gee demese ba zi'an la zi'an demesego yele yele bii zi'an ti ba maalɛ yetɔgum buuri buuri.
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y: Pɛgedina wa ka le bɔna $1  yɛ'ɛsa. Iŋɛ {{GENDER:|you}} bɔta ti fu maalɛ ka?
cx-entrypoint-dialog-desc:
Fu wan ta'am suŋɛ Wikipiidiya la pɛgerɛ wa leregere.
Leregere de la naana ti fu ta'am maalɛ puti'irɛ n boi fu yetɔgum puan.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Maalɛ gɔŋɔ paalega la fu lerege yese yetɔgum kayima ti fu mina.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-search: Ee pɛgerɛ kayima la fu lerege
cx-special-login-error: Fum sum mɛ ti fu ŋmɛ ki'isɛ gee lerege n boi pɛgerɛ LA puan. [$1 Log in]
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|You}} ka sum ti fu dikɛ ba za'a pa'asɛ
cx-tools-instructions-text3: {{GENDER:|Make}} gulesegɔ la kaali mɛ suŋa suŋa
cx-tools-instructions-text4: "Machine" leregere tari suŋerɛ gee {{GENDER:|you'll}} nari ti tu lebese gɔŋɔ la mɛ ti la iŋɛ la suŋa.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Sansɛka {{GENDER:|you}} are happy with the result, press "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-tools-mt-use-source: Maalɛ sɛla n boi sɔsega la puan
cx-tools-mt-dont-use: Pɔsɛ n boi "paragraph" beele la puan
cx-tools-mt-set-default: gulesɛ fu wan iŋɛ se'em la.
cx-tools-mt-noservices: Leregulegɔ tuusum ka le bɔna yetɔgum la puan. [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Content_translation/Translating/Initial_machine_translation|Why?]]
cx-warning-unsaved-translation: Fu tari la lerege duma ti ba ka nyaŋɛ tum.
cx-error-page-not-found: "$1" pɛgerɛ la ka nyaŋɛ nyɛ n boi $2 wikipiidiya la puan
cx-page-selector-widget-recent-edits-lab: Nananewa ti fu nan kɔ'ɔm demese ka
cx-source-page-selector-input-placeholde: Ee pɛgerɛ ti fu wan lerege
cx-source-page-selector-no-search-result: Ka nyɛ pɛgerɛ bo "$1" n boi $2
cx-selected-source-page-view-count: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 visit per|$1 visits per|0=No visits this}} bakɔi
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-and-t: Zukuna pugum diŋɛ dikɛ tum mɛ n boi [$1 $2] for [$3 a different page]
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-exist: Pɛgerɛ wa [$1 already exists] n boi $2
cx-selected-source-page-error-title-in-u: Pɛge-paalega la zuo de la [$1 already in use]
cx-favorite-added-for-later-detail: Pa'asɛ la pooren! Bisɛ putĩ’irɛ la n biseri sansɛka woo.
cx-favorite-removed: Ba yese sɛba n ba'am nɔŋɛ la yu'ura puan!
cx-mt-abuse-error-title: Fu leregere {{PLURAL:$1|contains}} lɔkɔ n de $1% n boi gulesegɔ n ka tee
cx-mt-abuse-error-sections: Fu leregere la tari la nimmu'urɛ bɔberɛ n ka tee gulesegɔ la
cx-mt-abuse-error-text:
"Automatic" lerege ti ba dikɛ pɔsega la ma'a. Bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti sɔsega la kɔ'ɔm dɛna la ma'a dee kaalɛ suŋa n boi fu yetɔgum puan.
Fu leregere la kan ta'am niɛ peelemi fu san ka demese pa'asɛ.
cx-mt-abuse-warning-title: Fu leregere la bɔberɛ {{PLURAL:$1|contains}} $1% ka tee gulesegɔ la
cx-mt-abuse-warning-text:
"Authomatic" lerege ti ba dikɛ pɔsega la ma'a. Bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti sɔsega la kɔ'ɔm dɛna la ma'a dee kaalɛ suŋa n boi fu yetɔgum puan.
Fu leregere la ta'am ta yese mɛ sansɛka ti demesereba la ta yeti ba malum bisɛ la.
cx-captcha-dialog-error: Fu lebesego la ka ani suŋa. N beleni fu mɛ le tiregɛ.
cx-captcha-unsupported-type: "Captcha" buuri n ka sugeri ti ba nyɛ.
cx-dashboard-sidebar-information: Zo'e zo'e yɛsera lɔkɔ wa puan
cx-dashboard-sidebar-feedback: Bo tu la n iŋɛ se'em
cx-suggestionlist-empty-desc: Tu ka nyɛ puti'ira. Fu ta'am bisɛ pooren bii bisɛ pɛgera n de nimu'urɛ tu sɔsega tuuma tara tuunɛ la (tɛɛseŋɔ).
cx-save-draft-save-success: Biŋe {{PLURAL:$1|a minute ago|$1 minutes ago|0=just now}}
cx-save-draft-error: Tuure n iŋɛ ni sansɛka ti ba biŋeri ni pɛgerɛ la.
cx-contributions-new-article-tooltip: Pɔsɛ gulesera n boi pɛgepaalɛ pua
cx-contributions-translation-tooltip: Lerege pɛgesi'a n pugum bɔna la
cx-contributions-upload-tooltip: "Upload" fɔɔra, yuuma la "video" ti ba tara tuna n boi pɛgerɛ la puan
cx-publishing-dialog-publish-anyway-butt: Dikɛ niɛ peelemi la san pugum ana se'em me
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title:
Fu leregere la wan gulesɛ pɛgera n boi bini.
N beleni fu mɛ, bisɛ suŋa ti fu tee sɛla n boi ni la.
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-title: Dikɛ niɛ peelemi dɔla yelesi'a n boi la?
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-message:
Fu leregere la kelum tara la yɛla n wan ta'am iŋɛ. N beleni fu mɛ, bisɛ yɛla la gee ta'am nyaa dikɛ niɛ peelemi.
Dɛmesereba n malum bisera fu pa'asegɔ wan Nam fu niŋa tɔlega la.
cx-overwriting-with-issues: Fu lerege fu lerege la wan gulesɛ pɛgera la ti fu bɔna la zi'an ti la puti'irɛ n kelum tara yɛla n wan ta'am iŋɛ. N beleni fu mɛ bisɛ ti tu bisɛ yele la gee nyaa ta'am niɛ ka peelemi
cx-draft-discard-confirmation-message: Fu tari yara ti fu bɔta ti fu sa'am lerege wa saŋa woo mɛ?
cx-beta-feature-enabled-notification: Yelesum lerege yelesum n tuni "wiki" wa puan.
cx-init-critical-error: Kɔ'ɔm tue mɛ: Yelesum lerege la ka nyaŋɛ "load" sɛla n sɔi la puan tuure n boi bini.
cx-campaign-newarticle-notice: Maale pɛgepaala bii lɛregera ka kɛ'ɛm nananewa! Fu boti fu ti fu iŋɛ la 'Content' leregere "beta" lɔkɔ la?.
cx-campaign-try: Tiregɛ lerege sɛla n tari puti'irɛ
cx-no-target-categories: Tigera ka boi.Ti'sɛ ti tu pa'asɛ basɛba ti ba dikɛ pa'alɛ yelesum la suŋa suŋa
cx-no-adapted-categories: Yelesum duma miŋa la ka boi yetɔgum wa puan. Bisɛ sɔsega zo'e zo'e ti fu wan ta'am pa'alɛ sɔsega la.
cx-stats-try-contenttranslation: Puti'irɛ leregule de la tuunɛ ti tu wan ta'am maalɛ pɛgera paala gee lerege yese yetɔgum basɛba puan. [$1 Try Content Translation]
cx-stats-draft-target-source: Leregere n toli niŋa n boi
cx-tools-missing-link-text: {{GENDER:|Mark}} pɛgera la n bɔi ti ba wan pa'alɛ a yɛla la.
echo-pref-tooltip-cx: Yele mam  yɛsera n lerege duma la ti n maalɛ ti n dikɛ puti'irɛ  lerege lɔkɔ tum la.
cx-notification-first-translation: Zaarɛ bo fu la fu yia lerege la puan! Bisɛ fu pa'asegɔ la gee ɛ pɛgera zo'e zo'e la fu lerege.
cx-notification-tenth-translation: Zaarɛ bo fu la fu pia lerege la puan! Fu nyaa de la Mina n mi leregere. Tara fu tuunsuma la bala!
cx-notification-hundredth-translation: Fu nan kɔ'ɔm iŋɛ la leregere kɔbegs! Bala de la yelepakerɛ daana. Pa'alɛ lasebaarɔ la bo dɛmesereba basɛba la.
cx-notification-deleted-draft: Fu leregere la n boi $1 ba to'e mɛ sɛla zuo n sɔi la yuunɛ la puan sa'am mɛ. Pɔsɛ leregere paalega n boi putɛsunɔ saŋa woo
cx-notification-deleted-draft-bundle: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 translations}} ba sa'ɛ mɛ sɛla n sɔi la yuunɛ la puan ti ba dikɛ ba'asɛ. La pɔsɛ ba mɛ sansɛka woo.
cx-notification-continue-translation: Fu pɔsɛ leregera la $1 nambɔɔsi asi'a n tole. Dikɛ e niɛ peelemi suŋa gee ti ba nyaam ta basera e "automatically" yuunɛ pooren.
cx-notification-continue-translation-bun: Fu pɔsɛ la {{PLURAL:$1|$1 translations}} nambɔɔsi asi'a n tole tiregɛ niɛ a peelemi gee ti ba ta nyaam basera ba "automatically" yuunɛ pooren.
cx-translationlist-empty-title: Sɛla ka boi n wan lerege?
cx-translationlist-empty-desc: {{GENDER:|Start}} fu leregere la nananewa gee tɔkɛ ka sansɛka.
cx-notification-suggestions-available: Yɛsera la {{GENDER:$2|your}} pooren leregere n boi '''$1''', putɛpaalɛ nan boi.
cx-infobar-cannot-publish: Fu leregere la kan ta'am niɛ peelemi se'ere n sɔi la peelemi niirɛ ma'a n basɛ ti ba dikɛ dɛgera la nɛreba n boi wiki wa zuo.
cx-infobar-old-version: Lereguledina wa baseri la yelesum bunkɛka yelesum la puan.Zuo pɛgera la ta'am tee ni suŋa suŋa, gee ti fu wan ta'am bɔta ti fu le malum pɔsɛ leregera.
cx-tools-linter-generic-title: Daaŋɔ n boi fu leregere la puan
cx-tools-linter-abuse-filter: Fila la n ka tari sɛla n wan iŋɛ fum n lerege se'em la puan pa'alɛ yelemiŋerɛ.
cx-tools-linter-empty-title: Fu leregere la nari ti di tara zuo
cx-tools-linter-empty-title-message: Pɛgerɛ woo nari ti ka tara la yu'urɛ ti tuntuneba nyɛta ba. N beleni fu mɛ, bo fu leregere la yu'urɛ ti ka ta'am niɛ peelemi.
cx-tools-linter-invalid-character: Fu lerege gɔŋɔ la tari yɛla n ka boi.
cx-tools-linter-invalid-character-messag:
Yelesi'a kan ta'am dikɛ tum n boi pɛgera la zuen se'ere n sɔi la, la Dr la "technical" vuurɛ.
N beleni fu mɛ, demese yelezure duma la la fu ta'am gu nɛreba n tari daaŋɔ.
cx-tools-linter-page-exists-message:
Pɛgerɛ n tari zuo $1 diŋɛ bɔna mɛ. Fu san yeti fu niɛ peelemi fu leregere la wan gãregɛ dikɛ yɛla n boi ni la gɔŋɔ la.
Bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti fu wan tee pɛgera la n boi na la, bii fu ti'isɛ fu yelesum ti fu lerege sɛla ti fu lerege le tita.
cx-tools-linter-cannot-publish-title: Peelemi niirɔ wan  ma'a nbasɛ ti ba dikɛ la sɛba n mi tuntuneba.
cx-tools-linter-cannot-publish-message:
Tiŋa wa puti'irɛ ti ba dikɛ lerege lerege gɔŋɔ la ma'a ti ba dikɛ dɛna gulesereba n nyɛ yele. Fu kan nyaŋɛ dikɛ lerege wa pa'alɛ fu sansɛka ti fu nyɛ yɛm pa'asɛ wiki wa puan. Amaa fu wan ta'am:
  • niɛ fu leregere la mɛ ti ka dɛna lasebaarɛ, gee dikɛ duŋa lɔgerɔ gɔŋɔ la pooren tum gɔŋɔ la.
  • Lerege gɔŋɔ wa yetɔgum yima yima gee ti beere wa san ka bɔna.
cx-tools-linter-template-block-message:
Pɛgemɛŋerɔ la tari la "template"  sɛka n ka boi "wiki" sore la puan.
Ba zɔɛ "template " kuŋa basɔ mɔ, amaa fu ta'am pa'asɛ putɔpaalesi la tu ta'am gurɔ lasebaarɛ si'a n bɔi la.
cx-tools-linter-template-inline-message:
Pɛgemɛŋerɔ la tari la "templates"  ti ba dikɛ puti'irɛ la maalɛ, amaa bana basɛba ka le bɔna n boi wiki sɔa la puan.
Sɛla n boi sɔsega la puan ti ba dikɛ pa'asɛ ti ba wan iŋɛ se'em ma'a gɔŋɔ la puan. Baŋɛ suŋa ti fu ta'am le bisɛ yɛla la.
cx-tools-linter-empty-template:
Lasebaarɛ la n boi sɛka n boi gɔŋɔ la puan ti ba wan ta'am dikɛ lerege la puan se'em la ti ba lɔgerɔ la kɔ'ɔm yima yima fĩi wa.
N beleni fu mɛ, gee lebese tɛgum la leregere la puan ti la pirɛ lasebaarɛ n ka boi la.
cx-tools-linter-template-missing-mandato:
Ba daa pa'asɛ la "template" gee tiblasebaarɛ ka pakɛ la.
La pugum ka nyaŋɛ ni to'e kɔ'ɔm bɔna la sɛla n boi sɔsega la puan se'em la ti ba lɔgerɔ la kɔ'ɔm bɔna la yima yima fĩi wa. 
N beleni fu mɛ, Demese gɔŋɔ la lerege la puan la fu pirɛ lasebaarɛ n ka boi la.
cx-tools-linter-old-revision: Leregere n boi pɛgera la vuurɛ kɛka la zuo.
cx-tools-linter-old-revision-message:
Leregere dina wa boi la tɔgum kɛka yelesum la puan. "Source pɛgerɛ la tara [$1 changed significantly].
Fu ta'am kelum  pɔsɛ lerege wa, bii fu le dikɛ pɔsɛ ti fu dikɛ yelesum la dikɛ     tuunɛ la. Fu san lebese lerege lerege la lebese mɛ, fu nananewa teere la wan bɔregɛ.
cx-tools-linter-reference-message:
Ba ka ta'am yese yelesum la lerege la puan se'ere n sɔi ti a dikɛ la dikɛ la pa'alɛ ti ba tara lɔgerɔ yima yima yima yima.
N beleni fu mɛ,demese yelesum la lerege la puan ti la pirɛ lasebaarɛ n ka boi la.
cx-tools-linter-incomplete-reference-mes: Ba pa'asɛ ni "reference" gee ti la ka pa'asɛ lasebaar asi'a.
cx-tools-linter-restart-translation-mess: Fu wan pɔsɛ lerege paalega bɔ'ɔra pɛgera la paalega la. Fu teere la za'a wan bɔna.
cx-publish-destination-header: Dikɛ yɛla n boi zi'an niɛ peelemi
cx-publish-destination-tooltip: Loe sɛla ti ba wan dikɛ pɛgera la puan niɛ peelemi
cx-publish-destination-namespace-main-de: Zi'an la puan ti nɛra woo kãalɛ.
cx-publish-destination-namespace-main-ex: Yese pɛgera la n boi ni la tee.
cx-publish-destination-namespace-user-de: Fu san dikɛ fumiŋa suŋa suŋa ti fu nyaŋɛ suŋɛ.
cx-publish-destination-namespace-draft-d: Lasebaarɛ sɛka n boi zi'an la puan tiŋa la wan ta'am bisɛ ti la suŋa suŋa suŋa suŋa.
cx-publish-destination-namespace-changed: Dikɛ niɛ peelemi zi'an la tee mɛ la nɛra woo puan. Iŋɛ pa'asegɔ yɛsera lɔgerɔ pu'usegɔ la pa'asɛ sansɛka woo.
cx-linkcontextitem-missing-title-descrip: Pɛgedina wa nan ka boi nanta
cx-mt-abuse-publish-error: Fu leregere la kan ta'am niɛ peelemi se'ere n sɔi la ka tari la gulesegɔ zo'e n ka tari teere
cx-unreviewed-translation-category: Pɛgera duma n tari leregere duma ti ba ka le bisɛ.
cx-unreviewed-translation-category-desc: Pɛgera n lerege dikɛ la puti'irɛ  leregere tuunɛ la ti n tari sinɛ n ka miŋa suŋa.
cx-preference-enable-entrypoints: Yɔ'ɔ n boi [[$1|start a translation]], ze'ele pa'asegɔ pɛgerɛ, yetɔgum yu'ura, la pɛgepaalɛ ti ba maala.
cx-feature-discovery-content:
Fu ta'am pɔsɛ bii tɔkɛ leregere sansɛka ze'ele la
  {{int:mycontris}} pɛgerɛ
cx-sx-missing-section-stats: {{PLURAL:$1|A section|$1 sections}} n borege n boi $2
cx-sx-section-selector-empty-missing-sec: Ka nyɛ zi'an bo fu leregere la
Tiregɛ la pɛgerɛ diyima bii yetɔgum tɔka tɔka
cx-sx-section-selector-automatic-section: Zi'isi n kɔ'ɔm baŋɛ "automatically" gee ba'asegɔ la kɔ'ɔm ka ba'am dɛna ma'a saŋa woo.
cx-sx-section-selector-unsupported-secti: Zi'isi asi'a kan yese yu'ura la puan se'ere n sɔi la Ba sɔsega la nan ka suŋɛ.
